name: First Data Corporation
membership: European Payment Institutions Federation, American Chamber of Commerce to the EU
goal: First Data enables global commerce and delivers innovative payment technology and services solutions. Our company is anchored in the EU and works with clients in 20 Member States. First Data's engagement with EU institutions seeks to promote growth across the EU market.
interests: Economy, finance and the euro, Single market
euInitiatives: Digital Single Market, Payment Services Directive, Interchange Fee Regulation, General Data Protection Regulation
